item.description:
Join me and a bunch of other professional women for Cocktails and Conversations with the Downtown Women's Club at Om in Harvard Square, Cambridge.

Meetups will be held in the main bar area on the first Monday of every month (held the second Monday in June). Since our June event was such a smashing success, the venue has kindly offered to host us in the Garden area of the restaurant for the rest of the summer, so we may also be there if it's not raining.

Also, the venue has a terrific Monday special (which was taken advantage of by many): 6 Asian-style dumplings (called "momos") and a cocktail for only $10!

See you there!

About the Downtown Women's Club:
The Downtown Women's Club is a business network and career website that makes professional networking affordable, effective and fun! DWC+ Premium members get free eBooks, teleclasses, member profiles, and much more. Visit http://www.downtownwo... and join today.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be hanging out in the bar/lounge area.

group.name: New England Network for Women :: Cambridge

item.name: Downtown Women's Club Cambridge Cocktails & Conversations April Meetup
